bill.title: Licensed Professional Counselors Board; abolish and transfer powers and duties to Social Workers & Marriage & Family Therapists Board.
bill.description: An Act To Abolish The Mississippi State Board Of Examiners For Licensed Professional Counselors And Transfer Its Powers And Duties To The Board Of Examiners For Social Workers And Marriage And Family Therapists, Which Shall Be Renamed The Board Of Examiners For Social Workers, Marriage And Family Therapists, And Licensed Professional Counselors; To Amend Section 73-53-8, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Expand The Membership Of The Board Of Examiners For Social Workers, Marriage And Family Therapists And Licensed Professional Counselors To Include Licensed Professional Counselors; To Provide For The Appointment Of The Licensed Professional Counselor Members Of The Board; To Amend Sections 73-30-3, 73-30-7, 73-30-9, 73-30-21, 73-53-3, 73-53-10, 73-53-11, 73-53-15, 73-53-17, 73-53-23 And 73-54-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Conform To The Preceding Provisions; To Repeal Section 73-30-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Creates The Mississippi State Board Of Examiners For Licensed Professional Counselors; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Human Services
